name: Motichoor Kay Ladoo Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Motichoor Kay Ladoo Recipe: For boondi: Gram flour ½ kg Semolina 1cup Water for batter Yellow color 1/2 tsp Ingredients for Sugar Syrup: Sugar 250 gm Water 3/4 cup Cardamom pods 1 tsp Char magaz as required
instructions: Heat oil and make bondi with the help of a ladle called jharna. Pour the batter in the jharna and press continuously so that the bondi comes down in the oil. Fry till oil stops sizzling approx for 1 minute. Now take out the bondi and keep aside. when all your bondi is fried, Again fry bondi for 15 seconds. Take it out. Make sugar syrup. Add the bondi to the sugar syrup add melon seeds and soak for 10 minutes on slow heat. Now cool down and make ladooâs with your hands. Ready to enjoy!
